Contributors

Studium has benefitted from the contributions of numerous individuals over the years. Contributors submit translations, biographies, and provide editorial and proofreading assistance as well.

The complete list of contributors is below. Click any contributor's name to visit a page with biographical details and a list of all translations from that author.

Caleb Bassett Jacob Behnken Nathaniel Biebert Evan Chartrand John Derme Isaiah Duff Andrew Ewings Benjamin Foxen Timothy Grundmeier Jacob Haag Philip Hunter Andrew Hussman Aaron Jensen Michael Koepke Kirk Lahmann Peter Metzger Philip Moldenhauer Souksamay Phetsanghane Robby Read Benjamin Reichel Timothy Rosenow David Strucely Aaron Voss Daniel Waldschmidt Joshua Zarling

Studium fosters the study of the confessional languages at Martin Luther College and in Wisconsin Evangelical Lutheran Synod by publishing original, English translations of historic Latin and German resources drawn from the Lutheran tradition in both Europe and the United States.
